title: I don't see Draft Pick on game mode on the alpha client
body: According to the league status, there is suppose to be draft pick added to the alpha client but I do not see the option for draft pick.

replies.body: Yep. Draft is coming. Just be patient.

> [{quoted}](name=Hinu Hyuga,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=ALKAAzsI,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-08-19T14:44:48.261+0000)
>
> Yep. Draft is coming. Just be patient.
I didn't know that the pbe alpha client was a different thing.

Are you sure you're not talking about the PBE?

And yes, when they add draft pick I guess more people will go and test the alpha or only log in via the alpha. Blind pick is horrible if you are lagging and have to pick the "fill" role because everyone locked in their choices regardless.
Thank you... didn't know pbe had it's own alpha client.
I so hope they add Draft Pick soon. It's the ONLY reason for me to not stay and test the Alpha Client because my buddies and I rarely play blind pick :/ Please Rito add Draft Pick!!!!!!
they will add it within a few weeks but it is currently online in the pbe alpha not the normal alpha so you'll have to wait.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
ahhh... I didn't know that the normal alpha client and pbe alpha client were different.
it is just like the normal pbe they test it first and get all the serious bugs out of the way. then they will bring it to the live servers.
